title: Yvette Nicole Brown - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #165
itunes:title: Yvette Nicole Brown - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #165
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!  Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe for the second time in a RESURRECTION EDITION of the podcast - this time with the wonderful actor and writer YVETTE NICOLE BROWN!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe for the second time in a RESURRECTION EDITION of the podcast - this time with the wonderful actor and writer YVETTE NICOLE BROWN!


Yvette was pure greatness on her debut, rays of sunshine at every turn, so it was Brett’s pleasure to bring her back to life for the second run at the game. This one’s another stunner right here as you would rightly expect, as she and Brett roll the dice once more and get even further into this whole existential kaleidoscope we all find ourselves in. AND she’s rocking a Ted Lasso jersey too, come on now. Yvette’s a treasure, enjoy!
